Description: Monitoring of mowing state of grassland plots

Citation.Info: These files are part of the dataset published with the data-paper mentioned below.
Citation.cite-as: Fersch, B., Francke, T., Heistermann, M., Schrön, M., Döpper, V., Jakobi, J. et. al (2020, subm.): A dense network of cosmic-ray neutron sensors for soil moisture observation in a pre-alpine catchment in Germany. Earth System Science  Data, submitted. DOI:

Remarks:
The state of the grassland plots (for location see grassland_monitoring_units.shp) was visually monitored every 2-4 days.
   The following categories were distinguished:
code	explanation   
c		cattle
pm_h	partially mowed, hay in place
pm_n	partially mowed, hay removed
u		unmowed
cm_h	completely mowed, hay in place
cm_n	completely mowed, hay removed
